page.title: 07HOLIDAY HOMES:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: Dwellings have electric lighting in various forms, with central and wall-light fittings. {NORTH NORFOLK HOLIDAY HOMES. This part of North Norfolk is truly "seaside", and attracts holiday makers for weekend and Annual holidays.Many of them hire caravans and many others own their own, and the sites' owners charge a high fee, or a rental accordingly. This sort of holiday is very popular, and there are many caravan sites in this area. They are mostly well run, with the proprietor or a warden, on-site. They have good amenities - Showers, Lavatories, shops, clubs , and childrens' play areas. The caravans nowadays have mains electricity for lighting. Some are quite luxurious.
